sdata.e: Our smile, which is understandable in the context of Japanese culture, sometimes causes a lot of confusion and is notorious among foreign people as a mysterious smile.

sdata.e: When indicating 'tense' in Chinese, as shown above, there are 'particles', 'time-specifying words' and also many cases where it depends on context.

sdata.e: Lungs, heart, veins, arteries and capillaries form the cardiovascular system.

sdata.j: ↑中学生↑↓ちゅうがくせい↓の↑頃↑↓ころ↓に、あるセラピストの↑女性↑↓じょせい↓の↑方↑↓かた↓と↑話↑↓はな↓した↑後↑↓あと↓、すごく↑話↑↓はなし↓が↑弾↑↓はず↓んだから「これは|↑脈|↑↓みゃく↓あり」って↑思↑↓おも↓って、キスしようとしたんだ。そしたら「やめなさい」って↑冷↑↓つめ↓たくあしらわれた。「↑俺↑↓おれ↓ってバカだよな」って↑痛感↑↓つうかん↓した↑瞬間↑↓しゅんかん↓でした。
sdata.e: When I was in middle school, I was talking with my therapist, and we had such a great talk that I thought "Maybe there's something between us", and I tried to get a kiss. But she gave me the cold shoulder and told me to stop. It was at this moment I knew I had screwed up.

sdata.j: ↑中学校↑↓ちゅうがっこう↓の↑時↑↓とき↓に、あるセラピストの↑女性↑↓じょせい↓の↑方↑↓かた↓と↑話↑↓はな↓した↑後↑↓あと↓、すごく↑話↑↓はなし↓が↑弾↑↓はず↓んだから↑突如↑↓とつじょ↓「これは|↑脈|↑↓みゃく↓あり」って↑思↑↓おも↓って、キスしようとしたんだ。そしたら「やめなさい」って↑怒↑↓おこ↓られた。その↑後↑↓あと↓、↑次↑↓つぎ↓の↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓に↑向↑↓む↓かいながら、すごく↑恥↑↓は↓ずかしくなった。
sdata.e: In middle school, I was talking with my therapist, and seeing as we were having such a great talk, I suddenly thought "There's a chance", and I tried to get a kiss. But she told me to stop. Then, as I headed to my next class, I felt so embarrassed.
